backend/main.mo: Implements access control, user profile management, and a full grant application system with create, read, and admin‑only update operations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature‑to‑file mappings with metadata, component dependencies, and confidence levels for implemented requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Empty CSS file placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Defines the base HTML document that loads the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for public pages and admin‑protected sections using AppLayout and AdminGuard.
frontend/src/components/admin/Applicatio: Displays full application details with admin actions for approving, rejecting, managing fees, and assigning receiving accounts.
Renders a searchable table of applications and allows selecting an application for detailed admin review.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReceivingA: Form component for creating or editing a bank or crypto receiving account, parsing initial data and submitting formatted details.
Protects admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status, redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and clearing cached queries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper including header, footer, and main content container.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with site branding, navigation links, and admin-only menu items based on identity and role.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusBad: Displays a styled badge for an application’s status using predefined variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-facing hooks for managing applications, fees, and receiving accounts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useApplications.ts: Applicant-facing hooks to create applications and fetch status, fees, and payment instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hook to check whether the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, logout, status, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Shows all applications for admins with selection and detail viewing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReceivingAccoun: Manages creation and editing of receiving accounts for payments.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Implements the grant application form with validation and submission flow.
frontend/src/pages/NotAuthorized.tsx: Displays an access-denied message with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/StatusTracker.tsx: Allows users to look up application status and related payment details by ID.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON state file describing the project’s version, requirements, existing features, issues, and image assets for the SBA Grant Administration build.
